text.autoconfig.InvChat.title: InvChat Configuration
text.autoconfig.InvChat.option.anchorBel: Position the chat widget below the player's inventory
text.autoconfig.InvChat.option.xOffset.@: Horizontal offset for the chat widget
text.autoconfig.InvChat.option.yOffset.@: Vertical offset for the chat widget
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.invchat: Allows chatting while in inventory screens
